item.title: Bootcamp Day 1
item.description: Discussion What are we going to do this week? Why did you sign up? What do you know about HTML? What do you want to learn? What will you be able to do at the end of the week? Learning How to Use Pop!_OS Connect to WiFi Open Firefox Use the Launcher: Press the SUPER key, which is usually is the Windows or âŒ˜/Command/Cmd key (recommended method) Click the launcher icon in the Dock Select Applications in the upper left corner Visit willston.
